topComments.author: Jason Ellington
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A tartaruga verde √© um destino √∫nico. Se vier de barco pr√≥prio, h√° um controle alfandeg√°rio no centro da cidade. Eles fecham por volta das 16h, ent√£o meu conselho √© chegar l√° antes das tr√™s. Hospedagem no Green Turtle Inn ou no Bluff House, ambos s√£o √≥timos. O restaurante do The Bluff House tem comida excelente. H√° uma √°rea onde voc√™ pode alimentar tartarugas marinhas e raias diretamente entre os dois lugares para se hospedar. Alugue um carrinho de golfe e reserve com anteced√™ncia, eles v√£o r√°pido durante as f√©rias e no ver√£o. Marsh Harbour, Treasure Cay, Elbow Cay est√£o todos a apenas 20 minutos de barco. Farol muito legal em Elbow Cay. H√° um aeroporto em Marsh Harbour com muitos voos de entrada / sa√≠da.  (Original) Green turtle is a one of a kind destination. If coming by your own boat there is a customs check in downtown. They close around 4pm, so my advice get there no later than 3. Lodging at Green Turtle Inn or the Bluff House , both are great. The restaurant at The Bluff House has great food. There is an area where you can feed sea turtles and sting rays directly between the two places to stay. Rent a golf cart and reserve it early, they go fast during holidays and the summer. Marsh Harbor, Treasure Cay, Elbow Cay all are only about a 20 minute boatride away. Very cool light house on Elbow Cay. There is an airport on Marsh Harbor with lots of flights in / out.
